name: Consider the Orbs
description:
The Orbs! Have you considered them??

This was a quick prototype of a game I'd played once before. It'll feel different than you're expecting because it's made with physics based objects instead of static ones that are normally the building blocks of this type of game. Since I was just adding to my portfolio there isn't any major game features like points or levels or anything, just a simple unity project that's here to enjoy.
